channel.title: A Bunch of RE challenges
channel.description: I found out on my pc a zip file with challenges for RE and I was trying to upload but I could not because zip files are not allowed... So I searched to find where I found the file and I come up with http://security.cs.rpi.edu/courses/binexp-spring2015/lectures/2/challenges.zip Idk if they are the original owners but have fun RE-ing :grin: I'm redoing those challenges again with radare2 just for the purpose of learning the tool. (amazing tool btw) Peace :v:

item.title: A Bunch of RE challenges
item.dc:creator: Bekoleko
item.description:
I found out on my pc a zip file with challenges for RE and I was trying to upload but I could not because zip files are not allowed… So I searched to find where I found the file and I come up with http://security.cs.rpi.edu/courses/binexp-spring2015/lectures/2/challenges.zip
Idk if they are the original owners but have fun RE-ing
I’m redoing those challenges again with radare2 just for the purpose of learning the tool. (amazing tool btw)
Peace
